title: Super Mario Maker 2 Details! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.16.19
description:
Robinhood is giving listeners a free stock at http://games.robinhood.com

Get 10% off your first order with promo code: GAMES at http://brooklinen.com

Tim and Fran go over the latest Nintendo Direct, Ubisoftnews, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:02:24 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:03:45 - Skull & Bones Delayed / Ubisoft Has 4 AAA Releases Through March 2020 By Adam Bankhurst (IGN)
00:13:20 - The Division 2 sold 10 times as many copies on Uplay as the first game Andy Chalk (PC Gamer)
00:17:10 - Breaking new: Sony and Microsoft to collaborate for streaming games
00:23:15 -  So Much New-New in Mario Maker 2
00:34:00 Best Friend Q. - Mario Maker 2 fervor has taken over the internet and I have a few questions. The first is how big of a presence do you think Mario Maker 2 will have at E3 this year? It will come out only a few weeks after the event and I felt we just got everything that they want to share about this game before launch. The other question I have is related to wild speculation, what DLC styles do you want in the game? - Borzen00
00:36:57 -  Robinhood
00:37:53 -  Brooklinen
00:39:14 -  Nintendo Switch Surpasses PS4 Lifetime Sales in Japan (Business Insider)
00:42:15 -  John Wick Fortnite Mode; Keanu Reeves’ Finally a Skin Matt Purslow (IGN)
00:44:25 -  Sega Confirms More Genesis Mini Games
00:48:05 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:52:45 - So with the amount of rumours about any amount of upcoming unannounced games, why do so many people fight with the idea whether said games will release on current generation or next generation? - Mark
01:01:30 - Required Reading/Awareness
01:03:02 - Squad Up:Griffin(PS4) - GriffiDPad
01:03:25 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Greg and Andrea
